quotes: In early 2006, he was photographed cycling to work, followed by his driver in a car carrying his belongings.
Cameron is an occasional jogger and in 2009 raised funds for charities by taking part in the Oxford 5K and the Great Brook Run.
At a Q&A in August 2013, Cameron described himself as a practising Christian and an active member of the Church of England.

organizations.name: Conservative Party
quotes: His Conservative Party spokesperson subsequently said that this was a regular arrangement for Cameron at the time.

organizations.name: MCC
quotes: A member of MCC, he is also a keen cricket fan and has appeared on Test Match Special.
